dt-option.description: This function is called on every 'draw' event (i.e. when a filter, sort or page event is initiated by the end user or the API), and allows you to dynamically modify the header row. This can be used to calculate and display useful information about the table.
dt-option.name: headerCallback

example.title: Show information about the records being displayed

parameter.content: `tag THEAD` element of the table's header
parameter.name: thead

parameter.content: Full data array of the table. Note that this is in data index order. Use the `display` parameter for the current display order.
parameter.name: data

parameter.content: Index for the current display starting point in the display array
parameter.name: start

parameter.content: Index for the current display ending point in the display array
parameter.name: end

parameter.content: Index array to translate the visual position to the full data array
parameter.name: display

type.signature: headerCallback( thead, data, start, end, display )
